content:
The colour of the account in the Folder Pane when new messages arrive can be set with css: 

/* folder pane account colour new messages */ .new-messages > .container > .name {   color: red !important;  }


Help/Troubleshooting Info, Profile Folder, Open Folder, close TB, create a new folder named chrome, create a new document in chrome with a text editor, name it userChrome.css, Save as type: All files *.*, copy in the above code, change the colour as desired. Double-click toolkit.legacyUserProfileCustomizations.stylesheets to true in Settings/General/Config. editor, restart TB.

Online css generator

video on how to create a css file (Firefox and TB)
creator: sfhowes

content:
Hello sfhowes,

Thank you for your speedy response. I tried it. Getting closer .....

The css you gave me accomplishes 2 color changes.

-- It changes the folder color in the Local Folders when a new message is there. -- It changes the Inbox color in an account AFTER I call for mail download.

Actually what I am hoping to achieve is a color change of the account name, after I hear the alert but before I call for mail. If there is no indication of which account caused the audio alert, then I have to go through all accounts, one by one, to see which one caused the audio alert.

In the following example, is it possible to change color of: jenny@xyz.com  ??

jenny@xyz.com 

 Inbox  Drafts  Sent  Trash

Thank you sfhowes.

jenny_abc

content: Do you have Google Calendar or Google Contacts address book?
creator: sfhowes

content: Of course I have it. But you must not be using aaa@gmail.com's Google Calendar or Google Contacts address book with Thunderbird.
creator: toru.fujihara

content: The point is, when you added the mail account you were asked to sync Google Calendar and Contacts. Removing the mail account doesn't affect the calendar or contacts, so they keep asking for credentials. Unsubscribe the Google calendar and remove the Contacts address book in Address Book if you don't use them in TB.
creator: sfhowes

content: Prihláste sa priamo z webu, či vám v gmail nenapísali, že vám zamietli možnost prihlásenia sa, a že prípadný útočník pozná vaše heslo, a že môžete znížiť zabezpečenie a potom že to pôjde. Takže problém môže byť aj vo vyššom zabezpečení na strane google.com. Stáva sa to vtedy, pokiaľ sa použije v krátkom čase pri prístupe k vášmu účtu viac prehliadačov alebo viac IP adries k prihláseniu. „Nedávno jsme zabránili pokusu o přihlášení do tohoto zařízení. Uvedli jste, že jste tento pokus provedli vy. Pro účely zabezpečení se toto zařízení bude po dobu dvou týdnů zobrazovat v seznamu. Zmíněnou událost můžete také prověřit na stránce“ = Preverte či mate vypnuté dvojstupňové overenie: https://myaccount.google.com/security?pli=1#signin a zapnite aj prístup pre menej bezpečné aplikácie: https://www.google.com/settings/security/lesssecureapps = A ešte preverte na webe, či ste si vo svojom účte povolili POP, alebo IMAP prístup: http://imgbank.cz/images/2015/01/12/Gmail_POP3_povoleny.jpg http://imgbank.cz/images/2015/01/12/gmail_IMPAP.jpg

creator: davidsk

content:
david said
It is what you mentioned, pressing cntl key and using mouse scroll wheel.

Yeah. Thing is it does not save the state of zoom. Example: I zoomed email 150% (even though I don't know exact number because there is no place to see). Then I close that zoomed email. Open same or another email and my zoom resets so I need to zoom-in again on each and every html based email.

My conclusion is that zoom is present but it can be improved: a) show zoom % made by ctrl+scroll up/down b) save state so each email will have same zoom c) make a separate subsection in Settings for this thing

For instance Google Chrome has all of these.

creator: davidsk

content:
Hello, Looking at the instructions for the other mail clients, you simply need to make sure your SMTP server is authenticated.

To check that: - Settings - Click on the e-mail address to open the account settings - Scroll down to the Outgoing Server (SMTP) - Click on edit - and from the window that appears ensure that the authentication method is with password or something more advanced.

Let me know if this helped.

content: You haven't provided any information on your account, such as your input and output server settings in full. The fact that your smartphone also stopped is a strong indication that the email provider changed the settings, as Thunderbird's settings can have zero impact on your phone. I would have thought they would take a serious interest on hearing that your email stopped on PC and phone. So, give us the info and someone here may have suggestions on whatever was changed.
creator: davidsk

content: Check webmail for a corrupted message: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1301414

content: How are we supposed to know? You have shared no information on this.
creator: davidsk

content: THe SMTP server is set for one email address and your account is set for another. This is fairly common when people have multiple email accounts and accidentally use two or more on the same SMTP server.
creator: davidsk

content: Under settings>general, you can tick a box to check if Thunderbird is the default and set it. BUT, sometimes Windows gets involved. SO, if setting to default doesn't work, you may need to search for 'default apps' in Windows to verify/set the default email app.
creator: davidsk

content: The problem may be your antivirus or firewall setting.
